data.marketing-page-pricing-meta-description: andcards pricing is affordable for every type of coworking space. Start using soft for $129 per month with all functions included + get a discount on a year plan.
data.marketing-page-pricing-features-branded-: Coworking is an experience. Let members touch your brand, stay connected with you at all times - all from the palm.
andcards built hight quality fully branded mobile and web apps for us. Having our featured apps helps us ensure consistent brand communication to build trust with our members.
data.marketing-page-pricing-features-features: Add all your members and teams without having to worry about fees. andcards apps are clean, easy to use, and integrate with all your favorite apps.

andcards application is ideal for managing shared spaces and coworking. It is simple, visual, at a very competitive price and has all the necessary tools without overloading with data that is often not very relevant.
data.marketing-page-pricing-features-friendly: Our team is available 24/7 to help you achieve the best result with your apps. We always respond within minutes and strive to find the best solution for your needs. We live to make your coworking space more cool and efficient, so go ahead and chat with us any time!

I chose andcards because of proximity, the possibility of discussions (how we use the software, what are our needs), the possibility to work as tandem finding the best solution. If we need some specific stuff, we can think about how to implement it together. I didn't have such kind of discussions with other app creators.
data.marketing-page-pricing-headline: The Right Price, No Matter the Size
data.marketing-page-pricing-price-notice: All prices are indicative and subject to applicable taxes in your country and payment method fees.
data.marketing-page-pricing-subheadline: Whether you're a single branch or a multi-branch network, andcards pricing just make sense. All functions unlimited, starting just $129 per month. We offer a discount on one year plans.
